unit_specific.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Death Guard Infantry units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

Once per Battle Round, one model from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly Death Guard unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.
While a friendly Death Guard unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

composition_and_wargear.unit_composition: This unit contains 1 Daemon Prince of Nurgle.
composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: This model is equipped with: an infernal cannon and hellforged weapons.

leader: This model does not lead any units. It functions as a powerful solo operative that provides aura buffs to nearby units.
